p: In the case of a zoonotic transmission the contamination is carried out either by direct contact with the infected animal or by the consumption of foods from infected animals (consumption of meat or meat products from these animals). The zoonotic power of some viruses has been demonstrated [as for the hepatitis E virus (HEV) transmitted by pork in particular], and it has been suspected for a few other viruses such as rotavirus and NoV ( Martella et al., 2010, Midgley et al., 2014, Bank-Wolf et al., 2010) ( Table 40.2 ).
